New Records: Willy Adames hit his 13th three-run homer of the season, tying the major-league record set by Ken Griffey Jr. in 1996; The Brewers have hit 57 home runs with runners in scoring position, while the Cardinals have only 25
Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a grand slam in the sixth inning; Andre Pallante had a career-high five walks, two of which scored; Kyle Leahy retired all seven hitters he faced, including four strikeouts
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals fell to 3-8 against the Brewers, including a 1-4 record in Milwaukee; Paul Goldschmidt extended his streak of consecutive doubles to five; Freddy Peralta had not allowed a hit in 14 at-bats against Brendan Donovan before Donovan's performance
